Data.title: BEAUTIFUL
Data.lyrics:
Beautiful... beautiful... beautiful...
Oh yeah

Yoake mae no sora shizuka ni sotto
Hora aratana hibi ga hajimaru
Mune ni shimai konda mama no omoi o tokihanate
Sono tsubasa wo hirogete one more time

Ima tobitatte ano unabara o mioroshite
Dare yori mo tōku nando de mo we'll fly

Beautiful don'na keshiki mo kimi to ireba kagayaku yo dakara zutto soba ni ite
And never let go boku no kono-te o
Hanasanaide doko made mo tsuite kite hoshī
The world is so beautiful

Toki ga tatte hi ga shizunde mo te o tsukande mada? Minu sekai e
Don'na michi demo futari de ayunde iku mayowanai-sa
Keiken ga hora meisei no yō ni kirenai ai no seimei-sen

Kakugo wa dekiteiru ready kodoku to kanashimi se ni
Ryōme ni misueru mezasu itadakinara tsuneni winning
Konosaki nani ga machiukete mo konotabi no naka de yume o miyou
Let's go kinōkyō ijō asu e no kibō

Ima tobitatte aoku sunda sora miagete
Dare yori mo tōku nando de mo we'll fly

Beautiful don'na mirai mo kimi to ireba hirogaru yo miwatasukagiri no kibō
Where ever you go boku no kono-te o
Hanasanaide doko made mo tsudzukete hoshī
The world is so beautiful

Reisei to jōnetsu no aida ni himeta tagiru o omoi-tachi wa never die
Hi wa mata nobotte ochite o kurikaesu
Inochi no kagiri nandodemo yomigaeru

Beautiful... beautiful... beautiful...
You make the world so beautiful, so...

Beautiful don'na keshiki mo kimi to ireba kagayaku yo dakara zutto soba ni ite
And never let go boku no kono-te o
Hanasanaide doko made mo tsuite kite hoshī
The world is so beautiful

Data.title: Gonna Be Fine
Data.lyrics:
[Intro]
Oh, ayy, oh
Oh, ayy, oh
 
[Verse 1: Yedam]
teong bin geori naedinneun georeume
sum jugyeo nareul seuchineun gonggi
meoreojineun jeo bicheui ongie
sirin nae sumgyeori maemdora
 
[Pre-Chorus: Jihoon]
jageun hansume damgyeojin geu mal
aesseo naebaeteo du gwireul mangneunda
 
[Chorus: Jeongwoo, Yedam]
tto naege malhae
naneun gwaenchanha ireon mallo
naneun gwaenchanda i jumuneul georeo
muneojineun nae mameul aesseo oemyeonhae
nunmuri heulleodo tto dakganaemyeon dwae
i bami gireodo jamsi nuneul gama
Tomorrow's gonna be fine
got naeireul chajeul geoya
 
 
[Verse 2: Haruto]
haruharu ssahyeojin hansume
du son gadeuk chaewojin gieokdeul
da moreun cheok gogael deureobwado
imi bujil eomneun iringabwa
 
[Pre-Chorus: Jeongwoo]
jageun hansume damgyeojin geu mal
aesseo naebaeteo du gwireul mangneunda
 
[Chorus: Yedam, Jihoon]
tto naege malhae
naneun gwaenchanha ireon mallo
naneun gwaenchanda i jumuneul georeo
muneojineun nae mameul aesseo oemyeonhae
nunmuri heulleodo tto dakganaemyeon dwae
i bami gireodo jamsi nuneul gama
Tomorrow's gonna be fine
 
[Bridge: Jeongwoo]
sasil algo itneun geol
jigeum naegen piryohae idaero
arajuneun na
 
[Chorus: Jihoon, Jeongwoo]
naneun gwaenchanha ireon maldo
naneun gwaenchanda geu eotteon jumundo
ijen da geojinmariraneun geol ara
nunmuri heureumyeon sorinaeeo ulge
i bami gireodo jamsi nuneul gamgo
oneureun nareul mideo
 
 
[Outro: Yedam, Jeongwoo]
Tomorrow's gonna be fine
ttonaege malhae
Tomorrow's gonna be fine
Tomorrow's gonna be fine
tto nareul mideo
Tomorrow’s gonna be fine
